牀几: (しょうぎ) - camp stool; folding stool
牆壁: (しょうへき) - enclosing wall/boundary fence; obstacle/barrier
片: (galinha/kata) - one-sided , one (of a pair); incomplete, imperfect, fragmentary; few, little; off-centre, remote
片がつく: (かたがつく) - to settle (a problem); to put an end to (a dispute); to be disposed of; to be settled; to come to an end
片が付く: (かたがつく) - to settle (a problem); to put an end to (a dispute); to be disposed of; to be settled; to come to an end
片す: (かたす) - to move/to put elsewhere; to tidy/to put in order
片ちんば: (かたちんば) - lame/lameness; mismatched (e.g. odd shoes)
片っぱし: (かたっぱし) - one edge; one end; one side
片っ端: (かたっぱし) - one edge; one end; one side
片っ端から: (かたっぱしから) - absolutely every little bit; everything from A to Z; systematically; thoroughly; one after another
片つけ: (かたつけ) - (incorrect: つけ should be づけ)  tidying up; finishing
片づく: (かたづく) - to be put in order/to be put to rights; to be disposed of/to be solved; to be finished; (also written as 嫁く) to be married (off)
片づける: (かたづける) - to tidy up/to put in order/to straighten up/to put away; to settle (problem)/to clear (dispute); to finish/to bring something to an end; (sometimes 嫁ける) to marry off (e.g. a daughter); to do away with someone/to bump someone off
片まひ: (かたまひ) - hemiplegia (paralysis on one side of the body)
片や: (かたや) - on one hand; on the other hand
片を付ける: (かたをつける) - to settle (a problem)
片一方: (かたっぽ) - one side; one of a pair
片付く: (かたづく) - to be put in order/to be put to rights; to be disposed of/to be solved; to be finished; (also written as 嫁く) to be married (off)
片付ける: (かたづける) - to tidy up/to put in order/to straighten up/to put away; to settle (problem)/to clear (dispute); to finish/to bring something to an end; (sometimes 嫁ける) to marry off (e.g. a daughter); to do away with someone/to bump someone off
片仮名: (カタカナ) - katakana; angular Japanese syllabary used primarily for loanwords
片仮名語: (かたかなご) - katakana word (esp. a loanword)
片便り: (かただより) - writing but receiving no response
片偏: (かたへん) - kanji "side" radical (radical 91) at left
片側制御モード: (かたがわせいぎょモード) - polarized control mode
片側町: (かたがわまち) - street with houses lined up only on one side
片側通行: (かたがわつうこう) - one way (traffic)
片割れ: (かたわれ) - fragment; one of the group or party
片務: (へんむ) - unilaterality (e.g. of a contract); one-sidedness (e.g. of a treaty)
片十字締め: (かたじゅうじじめ) - cross choke
片口: (かたくち) - lipped bowl; one side of a story or argument
片口鰯: (カタクチイワシ) - Japanese anchovy (Engraulis japonica)
片喰: (カタバミ) - (酢漿草, 酸漿草, 鳩酸草, 酢母草 only)  creeping woodsorrel (Oxalis corniculata); family crest shaped like creeping woodsorrel
片寄せる: (かたよせる) - to push to one side; to put aside
片寄る: (かたよる) - to be one-sided; to incline; to be partial; to be prejudiced; to lean; to be biased; to be biassed
片山病: (かたやまびょう) - Katayama disease (i.e. schistosomiasis japonica)
片山里: (かたやまざと) - remote mountain village
片恋: (かたこい) - unrequited love; one-sided love
片恋い: (かたこい) - unrequited love; one-sided love
片息: (かたいき) - difficult breathing; heavy breathing; gasping
片手湯桶: (かたゆとう) - wooden scoop, used for bathing
片手間: (かたてま) - in spare time; odd job
片手間仕事: (かたてましごと) - side job; odd jobs
片方: (katahou) - um lado, uma parte, contraparte, o outro lado, a outra parte; um de um par, companheiro, colega
片方向相互動作: (かたほうこうそうごどうさ) - one-way interaction
片方向通信: (かたほうこうつうしん) - one-way communication
片時も: (かたときも) - not even for a moment (with negative verb, e.g. not forget, not stop)
片月見: (かたつきみ) - moon-viewing on either the night of the 15th day of the 8th month of the lunisolar calendar or on the night of the 13th day of the 9th month of the lunisolar calendar, but not both nights
片栗粉: (かたくりこ) - potato starch; starch of dogtooth violet
片棒を担ぐ: (かたぼうをかつぐ) - to take part in
片歌: (かたうた) - ancient Japanese poetry form with three verses in a 5-7-7 moraic pattern
片田舎: (かたいなか) - back country; remote countryside
片目: (かため) - one eye; one of one's eyes
片眼: (かため) - one eye; one of one's eyes
片端: (かたわ) - crippled/deformed; imperfect/incomplete; (片輪 only) one wheel
片端から: (かたはしから) - absolutely every little bit; everything from A to Z; systematically; thoroughly; one after another
片笑窪: (かたえくぼ) - dimple on one cheek
片結び: (かたむすび) - half-hitch; half knot; slipknot
片翼: (へんよく) - one wing; single wing
片肌脱: (かたはだぬぎ) - one shoulder exposed (e.g. because one sleeve of the kimono is undone)
片肌脱ぎ: (かたはだぬぎ) - one shoulder exposed (e.g. because one sleeve of the kimono is undone)
片肌脱ぐ: (かたはだぬぐ) - to lend a hand/to render assistance; to bare one shoulder
